page.title: 03Manor Farm,Wood Farm Shipton
page.content: They eat 5.5kg of cake in the milking parlour.We have 40 calves they drink mothers milk for 3 days and powdered milk until they're weaned they get weaned at 5 to 6 weeks.We have friesians because they are a good dairy cow and good for beef.We have 17 bulls the bulls go to market when they're 12 months the weight of one bull is 400kg to 450kg. {Wood farm}is a dairy and arable farm. It has 125 hectares of barley,wheat, grass,potatoes and oil seed rape.The land is medium loam to heavy clay .The yield of barley is 7200kg per hectare, wheat is 9600kg per hectare,oil seed rape is 36000kg per hectare.There are 90 cows in the herd.In the month of May the cows gave 51,000 litres of milk.There are 90 calves,20 two year old heifers and 65 bulls.The most useful machine is the milking parlour.
